001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc;
002
003import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Observable;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.BehaviorProcessor;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.FlowableProcessor;
009import org.consensusj.bitcoin.jsonrpc.BitcoinClient;
010import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcStatusException;
011import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
012import org.slf4j.Logger;
013import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
014
015import java.io.Closeable;
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
019
020/**
021 * Implementation of {@link PollingChainTipService} using a {@link BitcoinClient} and a polling interval.
022 * This can be used as a fallback if ZeroMQ is not available
023 */
024public class PollingChainTipServiceImpl implements Closeable, PollingChainTipService {
025    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(PollingChainTipServiceImpl.class);
026    private final BitcoinClient client;
027    private final Observable<Long> interval;
028    // How will we properly use backpressure here?
029    private final Flowable<ChainTip> chainTipSource;
030    private Disposable chainTipSubscription;
031    private final FlowableProcessor<ChainTip> chainTipProcessor = BehaviorProcessor.create();
032
033    /**
034     * Construct from a {@link BitcoinClient} or subclass and a polling interval
035     * @param bitcoinClient a client instance
036     * @param interval a polling interval
037     */
038    public PollingChainTipServiceImpl(BitcoinClient bitcoinClient, Observable<Long> interval) {
039        client = bitcoinClient;
040        this.interval = interval;
041        log.info("Constructing polling ChainTipService: {}, {}", client.getNetwork().id(), client.getServerURI());
042        chainTipSource = pollForDistinctChainTip();
043    }
044
045    public PollingChainTipServiceImpl(BitcoinClient bitcoinClient) {
046        this(bitcoinClient, Observable.interval(2,10, TimeUnit.SECONDS));
047    }
048
049    public synchronized void start() {
050        if (chainTipSubscription == null) {
051            chainTipSubscription = chainTipSource.subscribe(chainTipProcessor::onNext, chainTipProcessor::onError, chainTipProcessor::onComplete);
052        }
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public Publisher<ChainTip> chainTipPublisher() {
057        start();
058        return chainTipProcessor;
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public Observable<Long> getPollingInterval() {
063        return interval;
064    }
065
066    @Override
067    public void close() {
068        chainTipSubscription.dispose();
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public List<ChainTip> getChainTips() throws JsonRpcStatusException, IOException {
073        return client.getChainTips();
074    }
075}
